Title: For Morale
Description:
Please excuse my husband's rudeness. When we signed up for our expedition, we expected to be away from our families for a few years at worst. Instead, we settled here as we guard against--well, against the end, against Renilash. Who knows when our watch will end?

I've been stockpiling a cache of wine from our church vineyards to share with everyone when tensions got high. My hiding place, Rumshackle, has been overrun by creatures. Can you get the wine for me?
ObjectivesText: Retrieve 6 barrels of Imperial Brut from Rumshackle.
